items.name: Pokéball
reviews: IT REALLY DOES CATCH 'EM ALL
I USE IT EVERY DAY!!!  SO MANY WILD POKEMON!!! ALL MINE!!!

items.name: Ultra Ball
reviews: IT REALLY DOES CATCH 'EM ALL EVEN BETTER
I USE IT EVERY DAY!!!  SO MANY WILD POKEMON!!! ALL MINE!!!  FOREVER1111

items.name: Super Potion
reviews: MY POKÉFRIENDS ARE SO DANG HEALED
I LOVE THIS THING SO MUCH

items.name: Max Potion
items.description: heal your wounded pokefriends to the max!!
reviews: MY POKÉFRIENDS ARE SO DANG HEALED TO THE MAX!!!
WHEN YOU REALLY WANNA HEAL SOME POKÉMON, THIS IS YOUR THING!!!!!!

items.name: Revive
items.description: Revive your pokemon and bring back to half health
reviews: YOU POKÉMON REALLY DO GO FROM ASLEEP TO AWAKE...IT'S AMAZING!!!!
NOT ONLY DO THEY WAKE UP...THEY GET HALF THEIR HEALTH BACK!!!   WHAT A DEAL!!!!!!

items.name: Parlyz Heal
items.description: Give your paralyzed friend some mobility!
reviews: WHO NEEDS FAITH HEALERS WHEN YOU HAVE PALYZ HEAL
MY POKEMON CAN WALK AGAIN, THANKS POKÉMART

items.name: Burn Heal
items.description: Need some cool for that burn
reviews: MAKE THOSE UGLY BURNS DISAPPEAR....IT REALLY DOES WORK
AFTER A NASTY RUN IN ITH A CHARIZARD, BURN HEAL MADE MY CLEFAIRY WHOLE AGAIN..I COULDN'T RECCOMEND IT MORE!!!!

items.name: Full Heal
reviews: MY TEAM IS TOTALLY HEALED LIKE, FULLY....CRAZYTOWN
THIS REALLY WORKS!!!!

items.name: Repel
items.description: Low level pokemon now fear your stench
reviews: IT KEEPS WILD POKÉMON AWAY, WHAT MORE DO YOU WANT?!???!
I USE IT EVERY DAY!!!  SO MANY WILD POKEMON!!! ALL STAYING AWAY FROM ME!!!

items.name: Max Repel
items.description: All pokemon now fear your stench
reviews: KEEPS WILD POKÉMON AWAY FOR HOURS AND HOURS, IF YOU WANT TO TAKE A STROLL WITHOUT SEEING POKÉMON, MAX REPEL IS THE PRODUCT FOR YOU
MY TEAM MADE IT TO CELADON CITY INTACT ALL THANKS TO MAX REPEL!!!

items.name: Great Ball
reviews: IT REALLY DOES CATCH 'EM ALL, AND DOES, CONSTANTLY
I USE IT EVERY DAY!!!  SO MANY WILD POKEMON!!! ALL MINE!!!

items.name: Potion
reviews: NEED A POKÉ PICK-ME-UP?  POTION IS JUST THE THING!!!!!
I GIVE MY PIKACHU A POTION EVERY MORNING, IT HELPS!!!!!

items.name: Hyper Potion
reviews: NEED A HYPER-POKÉ PICK-ME-UP?  HYPER POTION IS JUST THE THING!!!!!
I GIVE MY PIKACHU A HYPER POTION EVERY MORNING, IT HYPER HELPS!!!!!

items.name: Full Restore
items.description: Restores all health and cures all status effects!!
reviews: MY POKEMON WAS DEAD ON ITS' FEET, NOW IT'S FULLY HEALTHFUL!!!!!   THANKS FULL RESTORE!!!
GET THE EDGE YOU NEED IN BATTLE, USE FULL RESTORE!!!

items.name: Antidote
reviews: GET POISON GONE, USE THIS THING!!!!
WHENEVER MY POKÉMON GET POISONED, ANTIDOTE CURES 'EM QUICK!!!'

items.name: Awakening
reviews: NEED A POKÉ PICK-ME-UP?  AWAKENING IS JUST THE THING!!!!!
I GIVE MY PIKACHU AWAKENING EVERY MORNING, IT SURE DOES WAKE THUNDERGOD UP!!!!

items.name: Ice Heal
reviews: WHEN MY POKEMON GETS COLD I USE ICE HEAL EVERY TIME
ICE.  HEALED.

items.name: Escape Rope
reviews: WHEN I NEED TO GET OUT OF A CAVE QUICK, I ALWAYS HAVE AN ESCAPE ROPE HANDY
I CAN'T COUNT THE NUMBER OF TIMES ESCAPE ROPE DONE SAVED ME AND MY POKEMON

items.name: Super Repel
items.description: Wild pokemon flee enmasse from your overpowering odor
reviews: WHEN I REALLY DON'T WANNA SEE ANY POKÉMON BUT MY OWN, I USE SUPER REPEL.  IT SUPER WORKS!!!
WHERE WOULD I BE WITHOUT MY SUPER REPEL?
